001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.impl.DefaultContainerFlagSupport;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CustomCollectors;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
012
013import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
014import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
015
016import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
017import java.util.LinkedList;
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Map;
020
021import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
025
026public class FlagContainerBuilder<T extends IFlagInstance> implements IFlagContainerBuilder<T> {
027  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(FlagContainerBuilder.class);
028
029  @Nullable
030  private final QName jsonKeyName;
031  @NonNull
032  private final List<T> flags;
033
034  /**
035   * Construct a new flag container using the provided flag qualified name as the
036   * JSON key.
037   *
038   * @param jsonKeyName
039   *          the qualified name of the JSON key or {@code null} if no JSON key is
040   *          configured
041   */
042  public FlagContainerBuilder(@Nullable QName jsonKeyName) {
043    this.jsonKeyName = jsonKeyName;
044    this.flags = new LinkedList<>();
045  }
046
047  @Override
048  @NonNull
049  public IFlagContainerBuilder<T> flag(@NonNull T instance) {
050    flags.add(instance);
051    return this;
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public IContainerFlagSupport<T> build() {
056    IContainerFlagSupport<T> retval;
057    if (flags.isEmpty()) {
058      retval = IContainerFlagSupport.empty();
059    } else {
060      Map<QName, T> flagMap = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(ObjectUtils.notNull(flags.stream()
061          .collect(
062              CustomCollectors.toMap(
063                  INamed::getXmlQName,
064                  CustomCollectors.identity(),
065                  FlagContainerBuilder::handleShadowedInstances,
066                  LinkedHashMap::new))));
067
068      T jsonKey = jsonKeyName == null ? null : flagMap.get(jsonKeyName);
069      retval = new DefaultContainerFlagSupport<>(flagMap, jsonKey);
070    }
071    return retval;
072  }
073
074  private static <INSTANCE extends IFlagInstance> INSTANCE handleShadowedInstances(
075      @NonNull QName key,
076      @NonNull INSTANCE shadowed,
077      @NonNull INSTANCE shadowing) {
078    if (!shadowed.equals(shadowing) && LOGGER.isErrorEnabled()) {
079      IModelDefinition owningDefinition = shadowing.getContainingDefinition();
080      IModule module = owningDefinition.getContainingModule();
081      LOGGER.error("Unexpected duplicate flag instance named '%s' in definition '%s' in module name '%s' at '%s'",
082          key,
083          owningDefinition.getDefinitionQName(),
084          module.getShortName(),
085          module.getLocation());
086    }
087    return shadowing;
088  }
089}
